title: Evaluating functions
text: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.

title: Replacement
text: Replace the variable x with 2, and we get $$f(2)=|2-1|-|2+1|$$.

title: Calculation
text: Calculate the expression $$|2-1|-|2+1|$$. What do you get?
